forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 66F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
